      • singleTemplateInstanceForm

        @RequestMapping(value="branches/{branchId}/template",
                method=GET)
public Form singleTemplateInstanceForm(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                         ID branchId)
        Gets the form to create a template instance using a name.

      • createTemplateInstance

        @RequestMapping(value="branches/{branchId}/template",
                method=PUT)
public Branch createTemplateInstance(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                       ID branchId,
                                                                                                                       @RequestBody
                                                                                                                       BranchTemplateInstanceSingleRequest request)
        Creates a branch template instance for one name.

        • If the target branch does not exist, creates it.
        • If the target branch exists:
          • If it is linked to the same definition, updates it.
          • If it is linked to another definition, this is an error.
          • If it is a normal branch, this is an error.
        Parameters:
        branchId - ID of the branch template definition
        request - Name to use when creating the branch
        Returns:
        Created or updated branch

      • getTemplateInstance

        @RequestMapping(value="branches/{branchId}/template/instance",
                method=GET)
public TemplateInstance getTemplateInstance(@PathVariable
